allow: Bash(cmd /c "php artisan db:seed --class=PermissionSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=RoleSeeder")
Bash(cmd /c "php artisan permission:cache-reset && php artisan cache:clear")
Bash(cmd /c "php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan cache:clear")
Bash(cmd /c "php artisan route:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear")
